thread.title: BRIEF-Itron Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.01

title: BRIEF-Itron Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.01
text: February 28, 2018 / 9:16 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Itron Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.01 Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Itron Inc: * ITRON ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.01 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.95 TO $3.35 * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 TO $0.15 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $2.33 BILLION TO $2.43 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $575 MILLION TO $600 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11 PERCENT TO $551 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.93, REVENUE VIEW $532.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.13, REVENUE VIEW $2.43 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
